rationale.emotions

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • rationale.emotions.ChessBoard

  • public class ChessBoard
extends Object
    A representation of a N x N chess-board. Contains utility methods which help in :
    • Marking a location on the board as visited by a pawn (to simulate a pawn moving to a location on the chess board)
    • Finding out if a given location is already visited by a pawn.
    • Marking a location on the board as "can be visited" by a pawn.

      • ChessBoard

        public ChessBoard(int size)
        Parameters:
        size - - The size of the board. Size cannot be negative or zero.

      • ChessBoard

          Location finalLocation)
        Parameters:
        size - - The size of the board. Size cannot be negative or zero.
        finalLocation - - A Location object that represents the final Location.

    • Method Detail

      • getFinalLocation

        public Location getFinalLocation()
        Returns:
        - A Location object that represents the final location which marks the solution as attained. Once a pawn on a chess board lands on this location, solution has been achieved.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(Location location)
        Parameters:
        location - - A Location that represents the location to be evaluated.
        Returns:
        - true if the given location is inside the board and false otherwise.

      • visit

        public void visit(Location location)
        Given a Location object, the board marks this location as visited (to simulate a pawn moving on a board).
        Parameters:
        location - - The Location to which a pawn will be moved (internally this location gets marked as visited).

      • markAsNotVisited

        public void markAsNotVisited(Location location)
        Given a Location object, the board marks this location as free.
        Parameters:
        location - - The Location object that needs to be marked as free. [ This is essentially required when as part of traversing if a path doesn't yield results, then the locations in that path would need to be marked as free ]

      • canVisit

        public boolean canVisit(Location location)
        Helps determine if a Given a Location object can be visited or not.
        Parameters:
        location - - The Location which needs to be checked if it can be visited or not.
        Returns:
        - true if a location can be visited and false otherwise.

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:
        - the size of the board as an int.
